info.name: Primavera Dark (Beta)
info.description: A prototype of a dark-red themed Primavera/Flipswitch style sheet. By no means is this style complete and there may be many inconsistencies. Screenshots are updated to show consistency and active changes.
info.additionalInfo:
You can contribute to this style or report an issue here: https://github.com/Raeffion/FireFoxCSS/tree/master/Primavera%20Dark

---------------------------------

[UPLOAD] 3/11/2018: Beta 1.0

---------------------------------

Please report bugs and/or make new features suggestions!

Keywords: firefox, chrome, primavera, flipswitch, flat, dark, black, red, design, style, Raeffion
